import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Customer } from 'src/models/Customer'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2'; import { ServiceService } from '../services/service.service'; import { LoanData } from 'src/models/LoanData'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin', templateUrl: './admin.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin.component.css'] }) export class AdminComponent { orders: LoanData[] = []; deleteOrder:Customer={} submitStatus:any; constructor(private regService:ServiceService,private router:Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.regService.getCustomers().subscribe({ next:data=>{ this.orders=data; }, error:e=>{ alert("Failed due to Network Error"); } }); } logOut(){ Swal.fire({ title: 'Are you sure?', text: "You won't be able to revert this!", icon: 'warning', showCancelButton: true, confirmButtonColor: '#3085d6', cancelButtonColor: '#d33', confirmButtonText: 'Yes, LogOut!' }).then((result) => { if (result.isConfirmed) { Swal.fire( 'LogOut!', 'Your are Logout...', 'success' ), localStorage.removeItem('email'), this.router.navigateByUrl('/login'), console.log("Log Out Success") } }) } }
